amendment.description: To amend the Federal Fire Prevention and Control Act of 1974 to provide financial assistance for the improvement of the health and safety of firefighters, promote the use of life saving technologies, and achieve greater equity for departments serving large jurisdictions.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3401 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3401 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Dodd.
